content.body: i was thinking of getting a monthly working session call started on structs. i'll put a tentative calendar invite out, we can hash out times when asumu is back

I'm hoping to finish up an update for resource-management for the next meeting, as I'm hoping a RAII-style `using const ...` declaration will be useful for locking for a future concurrent JS. I'd ask for stage 3, but my spec reviewers haven't had a chance to review the updated spec text.
content.formatted_body: I'm hoping to finish up an update for resource-management for the next meeting, as I'm hoping a RAII-style using const ... declaration will be useful for locking for a future concurrent JS. I'd ask for stage 3, but my spec reviewers haven't had a chance to review the updated spec text.

content.body: While not as terse as `using value expr` was, I switched the bindingless form to `using const void = expr` because it made both the syntax and the algorithms much simpler.
content.formatted_body: While not as terse as using value expr was, I switched the bindingless form to using const void = expr because it made both the syntax and the algorithms much simpler.
